title: "Automated data source checks"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(covidregionaldata)
```

```{r}
check_data_sources(countries = c("afghanistan",
                                 "belgium", "brazil",
                                 "canada", "colombia","germany",
                                 "india", "italy",
                                 "russia",
                                 "uk", "usa"), 
                   worldwide = TRUE)
```
